contest-event.event-date:
May 26, 2019 D St. Galler Kantonal-Musikfest (Marschmusik)
St. Galler Kantonal-Musikfest (Marschmusik) 100 March Contest St. Galler Kantonal-Musikfest st-galler-kantonal-musikfest-marschmusik
None
March Contest
Lenggenwil, SG, Switzerland > held on May 25th & 26th
77 Bands, very much Wind (mixed Brass/Wind and Sections - sep. Saturday till Draw 49 & Sunday in Jury G & H and sep. Bands with Evolutions)
Winner Sat G: Musikverein Konkordia Au (Wind Band, Second Section), 86.67 Points Winner Sat H: Stadtmusik Altstätten (Wind Band, First Section), 89.67 Points Winner Evolutions Sat: Blechharmonie Kirchberg SG, 93.67 Points Winner Evolutions Sun: Musikgesellschaft Bazenheid, 87.67 Points
Jury G: Begert Hasler, Rütsche Jury H: Kühnis, Speck, Wohlwend
May 27, 2020, 9:02 a.m. May 28, 2020, 5:42 a.m.
1 Amsterdam Brass Paul van Gils
1 Liberty Brass Band Ostschweiz Stefan Roth
2 Liberty Brass Band Junior Christoph Luchsinger
3 Musikgesellschaft Eggersriet Roman Schnelli
